---
title: Login in the Web Portal
---


In this section we show how to login in the [web portal](https://biodiversite-quebec.ca/) so you could access to restricted information.

1 - Go to the [login page](https://biodiversite-quebec.ca/fr/login)

2 - Enter the user and password. Note: The user and password  store in the coleo database. (used to access to coleo App)
